caption.title: HCMV AD169 strain does not infect endothelial and epithelial cells, related to Fig 1.
caption.p: (A) The indicated cells (4x10 5) were infected with HCMV (MOI = 1) for the indicated times before qPCR analysis.
(B) The indicated cells (4x10 5) were infected with HCMV (MOI = 1) for the indicated times before immunoblotting analysis with the indicated antibodies.
